data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a distro that is meant to work with HTML::Template and
    PDF::Template. It takes the same data structure and API and
    automagically creates Excel workbooks. Hence, the Excel:: namespace.

    This is the only module on CPAN that provides a template for
    generated Excel files, which is an extremely common task for web
    applications.
